text: Juan MÃ¡ximo Rojas Proenza, known as Max Rojas (June 4, 1940 - April 24, 2015) was a Mexican poet, essayist, literary critic and culture manager. Rojas wrote long-winded poem Cuerpos, his last published work originally composed of three thousand pages and that could fill twenty volumes. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Mexican poets Category:Literary critics Category:Writers from Mexico City
title: Max Rojas
